price: Mi, zaista, dajemo život i dajemo smrt, i sve će se Nama vratiti!
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
